meanings.sent1: The teacher scolded the dummkopfs for not paying attention in class.
meanings.sent2: The village was full of dummkopfs who believed everything they heard.
meanings.sent3: The dummkopfs tried to use a broken umbrella as a parachute.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness made him a real dummkopfs when it came to following directions.
meanings.sent5: The clumsy knight was known as the biggest dummkopfs in the kingdom.

meanings.sent1: The circus was full of talented performers, but also a few dummkopfs.
meanings.sent2: The dummkopfs in the crowd were causing a ruckus during the show.
meanings.sent3: The group of dummkopfs decided to wear matching outfits to the party.
meanings.sent4: The team of misfits were like a bunch of dummkopfs trying to solve a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with laughter as the dummkopfs shared their silly jokes.
